import React from "react"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Signup({ onSignup }) { const initialValues = { username: "", email: "", phone_number: "", }; const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ username: Yup.string().required("Username is required"), email: Yup.string().email("Invalid email").required("Email is required"), password: Yup.string().required("Password is required"), phone_number: Yup.string().required("Phone number is required"), }); const handleSubmit = (values, { setSubmitting }) => { setTimeout(() => { console.log(values); }, 1000); setSubmitting(false); }; return (
Sign Up
{({ isSubmitting }) => (

Already have an account?{" "} Login

)}
); } export default Signup;
